job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pAs a software engineer you will be responsible for designing programming testing and maintaining production preproduction and prototype software applications You will coordinate with team leads senior engineers and management in order to create efficient correct and maintainable solutions that enhance current applications and create new products ppbrppThis is a replacement position and performance goals will be linked to the ability to manage work efficiently finish work ontime and produce highquality code with minimal outstanding issues Specific responsibilities will include maintenance and extension of a module responsible for capturing recording and reporting results for healthcare quality measures supporting applications which report enforce and monitor quality in a healthcare setting performing analysis and benchmarking of existing systems to identify bottlenecks and improvements work with senior staff members to grow knowledge of existing system functionalitiesppbrppstrongRequired Qualificationsstrongpulli3 years of experience in NET and C programmingliliExperience with ASPNET Web Forms MVCRazor Entity Framework and LINQliliExperience with Microsoft SQL ServerliliExperience with HTML CSS JavaScript jQuery Internet Explorer Chrome Firefox and SafarililiExperience with cloudbased design and deployments will be given precedence especially regarding the Microsoft Azure platformliliExperience with API development and microtransactional systems will be given preferenceliliExcellent communication skills both written and verballiliBachelors degree or higher in relevant discipline or equivalent work experienceliliSuccessful completion of a preemployment background checkliliMust be authorized to work for any employer in the US We are not currently able to provide sponsorship for this positionliulpp
